name: drc-embassy-management-system
description: Web-based management system for DRC Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya

scripts.fix:path: echo 'Opening PHP path fix guide...' && start PHP_TROUBLESHOOTING_GUIDE.md
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating configuration...' && php -r "require_once 'config.php'; echo Config::validate() ? 'Configuration is valid' : 'Configuration has issues';"
scripts.backup: echo 'Creating backup...' && powershell -Command "$date = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $backupDir = 'backups'; if (!(Test-Path $backupDir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $backupDir }; Copy-Item -Path '.' -Destination "$backupDir\bomoko_backup_$date" -Recurse -Force; echo 'Backup created successfully'"
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning temporary files...' && del /q *.tmp *.log 2>nul || echo 'No temporary files found'
scripts.xampp: echo 'Opening XAMPP Control Panel...' && start C:\xampp\xampp-control.exe
scripts.check:services: echo 'Checking XAMPP services...' && powershell -Command "Get-Service -Name '*apache*', '*mysql*' | Select-Object Name, Status"
scripts.restart:apache: echo 'Restarting Apache...' && net stop Apache2.4 && net start Apache2.4
scripts.restart:mysql: echo 'Restarting MySQL...' && net stop MySQL && net start MySQL
scripts.restart:all: npm run restart:apache && npm run restart:mysql
scripts.help: echo 'DRC Embassy Management System - Available Commands:' && echo '  npm run dev          - Start development server' && echo '  npm run test         - Run system tests' && echo '  npm run setup        - Setup database' && echo '  npm run status       - Check system status' && echo '  npm run backup       - Create backup' && echo '  npm run validate     - Validate configuration' && echo '  npm run xampp        - Open XAMPP Control Panel' && echo '  npm run phpmyadmin   - Open phpMyAdmin' && echo '  npm run monitor      - Open system monitor' && echo '  npm run help         - Show this help'

author: DRC Embassy Nairobi
